title: General form
text: If "R varies inversely with L" then the general form of our relationship will be R $$=$$ $$\frac{k}{L}$$.

title: Finding k
text: The constant k can be found by multiplying RL.

title: Evaluating k
text: k $$=RL$$. If $$R=128$$ when L $$=$$ $$24$$, what is k?

title: Finding new L value
text: Now we know our relationship is $$R=\frac{3072}{L}$$. To find the length of a string that vibrates $$64$$ times per second, simply plug in $$R=64!$$
